states.label: Bình thường
states.desc_en: neutral facial expression, relaxed posture, calm breathing

states.label: Nóng giận mặt đỏ, gầm gừ
states.desc_en: face flushed red, brows furrowed, jaw clenched, low growling expression, tense posture

states.label: Thờ ơ lạnh đạm, ngó đi chỗ khác
states.desc_en: emotionless face, half-lidded eyes, head turned away, dismissive body language

states.label: Tức bốc khói
states.desc_en: vein popping, eyes wide, steam-like anger, fists clenched, explosive rage

states.label: Bực mình dậm chân tại chỗ
states.desc_en: stomping feet repeatedly, puffed cheeks, frustrated pout, exaggerated annoyance

states.label: Lớn tiếng hét vào mặt người ta
states.desc_en: leaning forward, mouth wide open shouting, aggressive pointing, intense eye contact

states.label: Rén nhẹ
states.desc_en: shoulders slightly hunched, nervous eyes, hesitant posture, subtle fear expression

states.label: Quê... muốn độn thổ
states.desc_en: face blushing, eyes looking down, awkward smile, body shrinking inward

states.label: Mặt nịnh nọt
states.desc_en: soft eyes, forced sweet smile, head slightly tilted, pleading expression

states.label: Siêu cấp nịnh nọt
states.desc_en: overly exaggerated sweet smile, sparkling eyes, clasped hands, fake admiration

states.label: Mặt ngầu lạnh tanh
states.desc_en: stone-cold face, sharp eyes, relaxed but dominant posture, intimidating calm
